articles.title: Pope's apology to Canada's indigenous a 'step forward'
articles.description: Some 150,000 indigenous, Metis and Inuit children were forcibly enrolled from the late 1800s to the 1990s in 139 residential schools across Canada, spending months or years isolated from their families, language and culture.
